trends: There has been one other sighting in Eldon
There were no other sightings in Eldon on or around January 8th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsMyself and another Deputy were just leaving a call when we both yelled at the same time, "WHAT THE HELL IS THAT". Following, we observed a very bright object approx: 500-1000 feet off the ground, moving at a high rate of speed. The object appeared to have a "light" trail of approx 10-20 feet behind it. As we pulled our vehicle to the side of the roadway, the object climbed approx 20-50 feet at which time continued South at an even faster rate of speed. The object made NO noise and had NO additional lights or insignias. NOTE-I have been a Police officer for 10 years and a Private Pilot for 15 years and have never observed ANYTHING like this!
Summary: Very Bright-Low Flying-Fast-Looked like a falling star!! However, Object was approx 100 yards in front of us and tracking horizonal with the trees then climbing up!
